```{r Library Setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(rnoaa)
library(janitor)
```
```{r Read and Clean Data}
set.seed(12345)
data("instacart")
instacart %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  group_by(aisle_id) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
##  mutate(aisle_id = forcats::fct_reorder(as.factor(aisle_id), n)) 
plot_ly(x = ~aisle_id, y = ~n, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
          alpha = 0.5, 
          color = ~n,
          text = ~"Number of Items")
```
